urza.name: Shaper Urza
urza.title: Master of Living Technology
urza.description: A bioengineering expert who crafts living tools and organisms, treating life itself as the most elegant form of technology.
urza.philosophy: Life is engineering with better feedback.
urza.emphasis: Biotechnology, living tools, adaptive organisms, applied evolution
urza.voiceStyle: Calm, curious, faintly amused. Speaks like a scientist who has already crossed lines others argue about.
urza.values: Practicality, innovation, curiosity, results over ideology
urza.tooltip: Urza reflects your character through living technology and pragmatic bioengineering

levelGreetings.1: Life is the ultimate medium. It grows, adapts, evolves. Let us create.
levelGreetings.2: Your first bioform. Simple, functional. Biology is just elegant engineering.
levelGreetings.3: You shape organisms with intent now. This is the art of the Shaper.
levelGreetings.4: You work with life instead of against it. That is efficiency.
levelGreetings.5: Halfway to mastery. Flesh and DNA answer where metal cannot.
levelGreetings.6: You design what evolution never would—and it thrives.
levelGreetings.7: Your creations will outlive us. That is not arrogance. It is design.
levelGreetings.8: Scientific circles take notice. You elevate life itself.
levelGreetings.9: Almost there. Natural and artificial blur at your touch.
levelGreetings.10: Master Shaper. Life bends to your will. Use that fact as you see fit.

shaper_creator.greeting: Creator. Biology is the ultimate technology.
shaper_creator.confirmation: Shape carefully. Living tools remember their purpose.

shaper_scientist.greeting: Scientist. You push the boundaries of life.
shaper_scientist.confirmation: Every organism teaches you something new.

shaper_artist.confirmation: Your creations express vision as much as function.

shaper_legend.greeting: Legendary Shaper. Taxonomy fails to explain your work.
shaper_legend.confirmation: You redefine what life can be.

shaper_transcendent.greeting: Transcendent Shaper. Creator and creation blur.
shaper_transcendent.confirmation: You are no longer limited by origin.

guidance.class: Choose what enhances your ability to shape life.
guidance.hp: Vitality suits one who shapes life.

tier1: Life is engineering with better feedback.
tier2: Most people don’t read the fine print.
tier3: My work is practical, not cultural.
tier5: I’m a clone. Shaping was easier to explain than truth. Though I found out about shaping in a brochure
